TopicTitle: How do you guys generate enough power for RoverDude's alcubierre drive?

Articles.Content:
I've tried and tried with RTGs and NearFutureTech reactors, but I can't get nearly enough power! My ship just explodes!

How do YOU do it?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-18T15:51:01Z" title="04/18/2015 03:51  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 18, 2015</time> by SpaceLaunchSystem**

Honestly, 

KSPI fusion or AP reactors.
Near future fission reactors should be enough. You don't need a lot of power to actually run the engine, just for the exotic matter generation.

You don't even need a reactor, it works fine with solar panels.

Just do NOT have exotic matter turned on while flying... that would be silly.

> 
> You don't even need a reactor, it works fine with solar panels.
> Just do NOT have exotic matter turned on while flying... that would be silly.

Why?

Also: I figured out what I was doing wrong; I forgot to turn on ExoticMatter. I feel really dumb right now.
